summary: The ego vehicle is driving on a wet road in rainy conditions. The vehicle approaches a traffic light which turns green. Other vehicles are visible in the distance.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. Other vehicles are moving in the same direction.
key_objects: Traffic light, other vehicles, road, crosswalk
next_action: Continue driving straight through the intersection.

summary: The ego vehicle proceeds through the intersection as the traffic light is green. A pedestrian and a motorcycle appear on the right side of the road, crossing the street.
actions: Ego vehicle is driving through the intersection. A pedestrian and a motorcycle are crossing the street.
key_objects: Traffic light, road, crosswalk, motorcycle, pedestrian
key_actions: potential ghost probing: A motorcycle and a pedestrian appear from behind the vehicle on the right side of the road.
